name: Ludo ++
description:
Ludo ++ is perfect for all ages to kill time!

Ludo is a traditional board game, hot in many countries. The rule is simple and interesting, except luck, you also need to do strategy thinking. Now it's free for you to play on iPhone/iPod Touch anytime and anywhere!


Rules：

Ludu (or parchis, pachisi and parcheesi) is a game for two to four players. Players take turn to roll, can only take off when roll a six on the dice. Try you best to hit others and make them return to home base. The winner is the first to take all his pieces to destination.


Features:

1. Enable to load game progress.Auto-save when exit or phone ring.

2. Challenging computer or play with your friend on the same device, can play against 1-3 computer players or 2-4 players.

3. Excellent user interface and exciting sound effects.



How can you miss such casual and funny Ludo ++?
